title: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance 26 May - Annual Secretarial Compliance Report confirms full regulatory compliance for FY ended March 2025.
date: 26 May - Annual Secretarial Compliance Report confirms full regulatory compliance for FY ended March 2025.

title: Intimation Under Regulation 30(7) Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 (As Amended) 21 May - CCI approves Bajaj Finserv's stake acquisition in insurance subsidiaries with promoters.
date: 21 May - CCI approves Bajaj Finserv's stake acquisition in insurance subsidiaries with promoters.

title: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizer"s Report 20 May - Shareholders approved appointments of Sanjiv Sahai (Independent) and Rajeev Jain (Non-executive) as directors.
date: 20 May - Shareholders approved appointments of Sanjiv Sahai (Independent) and Rajeev Jain (Non-executive) as directors.

title: Information Under Reg. 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 Read With Schedule A Of Reg. 8 Of SEBI (Prohibition Of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015. 8 May - Bajaj Finserv reports provisional April 2025 premiums: Rs 2403 Cr general, Rs 719.37 Cr life insurance.
date: 8 May - Bajaj Finserv reports provisional April 2025 premiums: Rs 2403 Cr general, Rs 719.37 Cr life insurance.
